title: Volume-based Support & Resistance Zones
content:
This indicator relies on significant trading volume at fractal lows or highs, and the zones are determined by the length of the candle wick for that particular time frame. This helps traders identify critical price levels that play an important role in either reversing a trend or maintaining its continuation when zones are broken and subsequently retested. It is possible to use up to 4 different periods simultaneously.

To add and set up the indicator, open the Indicators settings window.


Indicator's settings

General

NameDescription
Extend previous Determines whether to extend the specified element until the start of the next one.
Extend last Determines whether to extend the last element.
Show time frame label Determines whether the text label should be displayed.
Label location Specifies the display location of the label.

Options:
  • Left
  • Right
Text Size Determines the size of the text to be displayed.

High-Low

NameDescription
Show lines Determines whether to display lines on the chart.
Line width Determines the width of the displayed line.
Line style Specifies the dash pattern used for lines in the chart, allowing selection of styles like solid, dotted, dashed, or custom patterns for visual differentiation

Options:
  • Solid
  • Dash
  • Dot
  • Dash Dot
  • Dash Dot Dot

Open / close

NameDescription
Show lines Determines whether to display lines on the chart.
Line width Determines the width of the displayed line.
Line style Specifies the dash pattern used for lines in the chart, allowing selection of styles like solid, dotted, dashed, or custom patterns for visual differentiation

Options:
  • Solid
  • Dash
  • Dot
  • Dash Dot
  • Dash Dot Dot

Time frame 1

NameDescription
Timeframe Allows you to select one of the available timeframes.

Options:
  • M1
  • M5
  • M10
  • M15
  • M30
  • Hourly
  • H2
  • H4
  • H6
  • Daily
  • Weekly
  • Monthly
Display mode Allows you to select one of the available display modes for this element.

Options:
  • Zone
  • Line
  • Disabled
SMA Period Specifies the quantity of recent candles to include in the calculations.
Resistance color Defines the color for the element displaying the resistance level or resistance zone.
Support color Defines the color for the element displaying the support level or support zone.
Transparency This setting allows users to customize transparency of the visual objects on the chart.

Alerts

NameDescription
Use Alert This setting enables alert notifications for specific conditions or events as defined by the indicator. When activated, the indicator will send an alert.
Alert File This parameter allows users to specify the name of a custom audio file for alert sounds. Users can select a WAV file that will be played whenever an alert condition is triggered. The chosen WAV file should be located in the folder C:\Program Files (x86)\ATAS Platform\Sounds.
Foreground Sets the color of the text in the alert window.
Background Sets the background color of the alert window.
